data.actual_result: Invalid or Expired link message. Submitted for [ jagrosh ]#5344 (194257036828082176)
data.short_description: When you try to join a guild and you are already on 100 guilds, you (in the past) got a "Maximum Guilds Reached (100)" message. Now, it acts like the link is expired or invalid, even if it's the guild cap causing the issue.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join 100 guilds. - Attempt to join a valid invite link
